import React from "react"; import {Card} from 'react-bootstrap'; const Minuman = () => { return (
Stop Blaming “All blame is a waste of time. No matter how much fault you find with another, and regardless of how much you blame him”
- Wayne Dyer -
 Work with Love “The man who does more than he is paid for will soon be paid more than he does”
- Napoleon Hill -
Do Not Give Up “Don’t give up when you still have something to give. Nothing is really over”
- Brian Dyson -
 Enjoy Your Life “Change hurts. It makes people insecure, confused, and angry. People want things”
- Richard Marcinko -
); }; export default Minuman;
